name: Son Savaşçı
description:
For the first time in 2D games, we performed completely in Turkish. We wanted to make you experience the past Atari period again. We are proud to start a brand new era in the gaming world, and this is just the beginning. The Last Warrior game will connect you to the game in a great way with its gameplay and in-game story. We will be looking forward to your comments, support, suggestions, criticism and feedback. With your support and help, we will offer much better games to your liking.
All you have to do is just log in to the game and enjoy the game. What are you waiting for?
Get your character and start saving the world now. Because this is just the beginning.

STORY
Some parts of the world are taken over by unknown forces. Huge explosion occurs in New York. While people try to understand what is happening in a state of great fear and panic, they also seek a savior for themselves. World Protection Organization leader Colonel Rossveild immediately orders Hope Connor to be summoned. Hope Connor, the woman she loves, Agent Aidan and Colonel Rossveild embark on a spectacular operation to save New York. In this operation, Hope Connor encounters people she did not expect, things she did not expect happen to her, and she is left with a great betrayal from someone very close. But in this world, unfortunately, good people do not always win ...

SECTIONS
Chapter -1 - Meet the Enemy
Chapter -2- Kill Vito
Chapter -3- Mountaineer in Suit
Chapter -4- Skirts of the Mountain
Chapter -5- When It's Over
Chapter -6- Save yourself
Chapter -7- Pig Hunt
Chapter -8- Good People Do Not Win (FINAL)
